group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Is it just me...

group_1.textRight: ...tension in the air?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm? Someone's watching us. Is it them?

group_1.textRight: Yachan, aren't those two Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: It looks like it. I wonder if they live in@Chuo Ward.
Let's try talking to them.
This will be a good chance to personally hear@what the girls here think about all this.

group_1.textRight: Please wait for us here.
We don't want to intimidate them.
Excuse me, but are the two of you Magical@Girls from Chuo Ward by any chance?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800201:lipSynch_1]Umm, what should we do?
S-sorry, but we're kind of in a hurry.

group_1.textRight: For someone in a hurry, you seemed to be@keeping a close eye on us.

group_1.textLeft: That's, umm...

group_1.textRight: We aren't angry or anything.
We were just wondering what things are@currently like in Chuo Ward.
Can we please speak to you for a moment?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800300:cheek_0][chara:800300:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:800300:lipSynch_1]W-we can't!

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: You're Yachiyo and Mifuyu, the leaders of@the west, right?
If someone from the east sees us talking to@you...
They'll think we're on your side and we'll @get targeted.

group_1.textRight: But, umm! That doesn't mean we're on the@east's side or anything.
We're not on either side, so we don't want@any trouble.
So, uh...

group_1.textLeft: Please leave us alone!
Please...just leave.
Let's go. We're sorry for bothering you.

group_1.textRight: Yes. Please excuse us.
[chara:800300:lipSynch_1]The east and west are the same.
All they care about is getting more Grief@Seeds.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, both sides are only looking out for@themselves.
They don't care at all about the Magical@Girls of Chuo Ward.

group_1.textRight: We need Grief Seeds, too...
No matter which side we join, we'll end up@getting used.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, should we talk to Hinano about this?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, especially since those two showed up@together.
How did it go?

group_1.textLeft: Not great. They're too cautious. I don't@think they trust us at all.
I was hoping we could hear what they had to@say.

group_1.textRight: That's too bad.
I guess all we can do now is look for the@Labyrinth where Momoko was attacked.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, if we try and force anyone to talk to@us, we'll only leave a bad impression.

group_1.textRight: I agree. Let's start with what we can do.
I remember its magic, so you can count on me@to lead the way.
